Get ESPN NBA's Standings

Source: R/espn_nba_data.R
espn_nba_standings.Rd

Get ESPN NBA's Standings

espn_nba_standings(year)

Arguments

year

Either numeric or character (YYYY)

Examples

# \donttest{
espn_nba_standings(year = 2021)
